text:
Receipts
which may be counted towards 95 percent: 1, 2, 3, 4. Receipts
which may not be counted towards 95 percent: X, Y, Z. If
more than 5 percent of the commodities come from X, Y, or Z, the exemption does
not apply. AREA
OUTSIDE DISTANCE SPECIFIED IN REG. PART 536
html:
Receipts which may be counted towards 95 percent: 1, 2, 3, 4.

 

Receipts which may not be counted towards 95 percent: X, Y, Z.

 

If more than 5 percent of the commodities come from X, Y, or Z, the exemption does not apply.

 

AREA OUTSIDE DISTANCE SPECIFIED IN REG. PART 536
